Closed issue "Getters on injected dynamic module get lost" (#1158) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/50wL7mdz/104859/](https://jsfiddle.net/50wL7mdz/104859/)

### Steps to reproduce
Getters from injected dynamic module on reproduction code must returned "bar ahihi", but actually I got undefined (the getter didn't exist)

### What is expected?
Getters from injected dynamic module on reproduction code must returned "bar ahihi"

### What is actually happening?
Got undefined

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Mutations not commited" (#1159) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/r0p9pnr49p](https://codesandbox.io/s/r0p9pnr49p)

### Steps to reproduce
If you open Vue devtools and click commit on last mutation, data will appear.

### What is expected?
Numbers from 1-7 below Data title.

### What is actually happening?
Only title is visible.

---
There is some commented code inside store (`state: items, getter: getItemsForLayoutId`) because that is a code from my real project. This `abc` is just for demonstration that it doesn't work even in a more simple solution.

In HelloWorld component is a `cards`computed property, which loads data from store. If it's not there, then it will dispatch an action to retrieve a data (api call is replaced with dummy data).

I guess I'm doing something wrong, but don't know why.

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Mutations not commited" (#1159) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/r0p9pnr49p](https://codesandbox.io/s/r0p9pnr49p)

### Steps to reproduce
If you open Vue devtools and click commit on last mutation, data will appear.

### What is expected?
Numbers from 1-7 below Data title.

### What is actually happening?
Only title is visible.

---
There is some commented code inside store (`state: items, getter: getItemsForLayoutId`) because that is a code from my real project. This `abc` is just for demonstration that it doesn't work even in a more simple solution.

In HelloWorld component is a `cards`computed property, which loads data from store. If it's not there, then it will dispatch an action to retrieve a data (api call is replaced with dummy data).

I guess I'm doing something wrong, but don't know why.

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "State not changes in UI component after commit" (#1154) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://gist.github.com/moeinroid/3743a5814e8b172e91ef40be830f4be1](https://gist.github.com/moeinroid/3743a5814e8b172e91ef40be830f4be1)

### Steps to reproduce
I'm using vuejs with vue-router and vuex.
I have a module with state, actions and mutations. With actions i call a api and get data from it and change the state by committing mutation

### What is expected?
component changes Instantly

### What is actually happening?
in my component values doesnot changes but when i go to another route and come back, it changes.
